statements: SELECT * FROM cash_flow_tracking
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM cash_flow_tracking
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_tracking WHERE amount > 100
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_tracking ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM cash_flow_tracking
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_tracking WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT transaction_id, description FROM cash_flow_tracking WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_id DESC
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM cash_flow_tracking WHERE description LIKE '%salary%'
SELECT * FROM cash_flow_tracking WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM cash_flow_tracking WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY transaction_id
SELECT * FROM cash_flows;
SELECT transaction_date, description, amount FROM cash_flows WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description, amount FROM cash_flows ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM cash_flows WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT transaction_date, amount, description FROM cash_flows ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE cash_inflow > cash_outflow ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT data_id, date, cash_inflow - cash_outflow AS net_cash_flow FROM financial_data WHERE cash_inflow > cash_outflow ORDER BY date LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount, description FROM cash_flows WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(opening_balance) AS max_balance, MIN(closing_balance) AS min_balance FROM financial_data;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_transaction_amount, SUM(amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM cash_flows;
SELECT * FROM CashFlow ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM CashFlow WHERE category = 'Food';
SELECT id, category, notes FROM CashFlow WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM Liquidity WHERE current_balance > 5000 AND cash_inflow > 1000;
SELECT date, account_name, income, expenses FROM FinancialData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, transaction_date, amount FROM CashFlow WHERE category = 'Income' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Liquidity WHERE cash_inflow > cash_outflow;
SELECT account_name, income, expenses, balance FROM FinancialData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT id, date, current_balance FROM Liquidity WHERE current_balance < 0;
SELECT id, date, cash_inflow, cash_outflow FROM Liquidity WHERE date > '2022-03-15' ORDER BY cash_inflow DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM cash_flows
SELECT company_name, profit FROM financial_data WHERE profit > expenses
SELECT * FROM liquidity ORDER BY time_stamp DESC
SELECT transact_id, transact_type, transact_amount FROM financial_transactions
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transact_type = 'expense' ORDER BY transact_amount DESC
SELECT liquidity_amount, time_stamp FROM liquidity WHERE liquidity_id = 1
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE profit > expenses
SELECT * FROM cash_flows WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT transact_type, AVG(transact_amount) AS avg_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY transact_type
SELECT * FROM cash_flow ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, amount, description FROM cash_flow WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT company_name, revenue FROM financial_data WHERE revenue < expenses;
SELECT * FROM real_time_data ORDER BY value ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT transaction_type, timestamp FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Income' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM cash_flow ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, description, amount FROM cash_flow WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT company_name, revenue - expenses AS net_income FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY net_income DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_type, amount, timestamp FROM financial_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM real_time_data WHERE value > 50 AND data_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 3;
